title: Ai2 says its Molmo 2 multimodal AI model can do more with less data
description:
Molmo 2 is an 8B-parameter model that surpasses the 72B-parameter Molmo in accuracy, temporal understanding, and pixel-level grounding.

The post Ai2 says its Molmo 2 multimodal AI model can do more with less data appeared first on The Robot Report.
